1051480.name: RUTM 2017 - Season 2018/19 Update
1051480.description:
Season Update for 2018/2019

This DLC features a full season 2018/2019 upgrade for Rugby Union Team Manager 2017. This update includes the new updated competition structure and fixtures.

  • Updated English Premiership teams, Fixtures, Squad lists + Stats and kits.
  • Updated Pro 14 teams, Fixtures, Squad lists + Stats and kits.
  • Updated Top 14 teams, Fixtures, Squad lists + Stats and kits.
  • Updated Pro D2 teams, Fixtures, Squad lists + Stats and kits.


If you purchase the 2019 Season DLC update, but still wish to play with your old saved games, please just untick the Installed checkbox in the DLC section of the Library page in Steam. To switch back to play with the 2019 Season DLC update, then please just tick the Installed checkbox.

Please note your old saved games created before the 2019 season update will not work with the new update, and any saved games created whilst playing with the new 2019 season update will not work or show up with the non-updated game

Also note:-
When you tick or untick the Installed check box in the DLC section of the Steam Library, it activates a download update.
So each time you tick or untick the Installed checkbox, you have to wait for the update to download.
1051480.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
